description: Netsuke; two figures representing one of the gods of happiness, Fukurokuju, and a child.  Fukurokuju is shown as an old man with a long beard, wearing the costume of a learned man.  He has an enormously high skull, as the result of meditating on how to make mankind happy.  He holds a roll of manuscript in one hand, a staff in the other.
title: Netsuke
